DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Age 30 year implanted intrathecal drug delivery device . Intrathecal pump patient stable dose last 3 month . Using average 2 less 10 PTM dos per day Intrathecal medication admixture consist bupivacaine another opioid ( fentanyl hydromorphone morphine ) Exclusion Criteria Using 10 PTM bolus dos per day 2 less PTM bolus dos per day Pending litigation worker compensation claim Any recent ( less 3 month ) procedures spine ( surgery ) catheter adjustment .
